author: niallp
msg: Upgrading from maven-surefire-plugin 2.3 to 2.4.2 broke validator tests - surefire used to ignore tests named Abstract*Test, but since version 2.4 tests have to actually be "abstract" - see http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/SUREFIRE-167

author: oheger
msg: CONFIGURATION-315: CombinedConfiguration now only sends a single EVENT_COMBINED_INVALIDATE event for a changed child configuration

author: brett
msg: remove comment, test is reliable now
